notFound.subtitle: Looks like you rolled a losing hand, let's get you back on track!

member1.name: Agent Sophia Ferrari
member1.description: Sophia, a strategist with a steady hand, masters the cards like no one else. One glance at her poker face is enough to make her opponents sweat. Her favorite saying: 'In my game, there's no room for mistakes.'

member2.name: Luca 'The King of Roulette' Verdi
member2.description: Luca is the embodiment of elegance and precision. His talent at the roulette table is legendary. He knows the laws of chance, yet he always wins. His secret weapon? A smile that lights up the room.

member3.name: Maximilian Schmidt
member3.description: Maximilian may appear calm and composed, but beneath the surface lies a formidable opponent. His Texas Hold'em skills are world-renowned, and he never leaves doubt about his next move.

member4.name: Marco 'The Spy' Rossi
member4.description: With charm, style, and a touch of mystery, Marco captures everyone's attention. His passion for the game is only surpassed by his secret mission: to deliver the perfect casino experience.
